text: We've found the same across a few of our sites, with dips going beyond blog with commercial pages also seeing some declines. I'm almost 100% certain it's algorithmic, and undertook a pretty comprehensive analysis to draw this conclusion. Happy to run through what exactly I looked at to come to this answer :slightly_smiling_face:
